input.sentences: on our hike today we saw many interesting tree formations .
i really enjoyed seeing all the different vanes in the rocks .
it was really fun taking this silhouette photo .
i loved this dead-looking tree and felt it needed to be photographed in black and white .
at the end of the day we saw this beautiful tree against the sunset .
output.sentences: The Joshua tree was one of Dan's favorite plants to photograph in the desert.
Dan loved to touch all of the desert rocks.
He liked to take shadow selfies with his girlfriend every visit.
Dead trees were also one of Dan's favorite things to take a picture of.
At the end of the day, his favorite thing to do was look at the sunset.
